notes: can mean a person or the language; use article in many contexts
example_sentence_english: He studies English at university.
I know an English person.

notes: contraction of una before a vowel
example_sentence_english: I met an English woman at the bar.

notes: contraction of il/la before a vowel
example_sentence_english: The Englishman speaks slowly.

notes: contraction of il/la before a vowel
example_sentence_english: The Englishwoman's name is Anna.
The English people love tea.
I know many English women in London.
The English people are in town.
The English women have arrived.

notes: partitive plural form; also contraction of di + gli
example_sentence_italian: Parlo con degli inglesi al festival.
example_sentence_english: I talk with some English people at the festival.

notes: partitive plural form; contraction of di + le
example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato delle inglesi al mercato.
example_sentence_english: I found some English women at the market.
The English person's accent is clear.

example_sentence_italian: Il libro dell'inglese è sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The English woman's book is on the table.
I speak to the Englishman at the conference.
He explained everything to the Englishwoman.
I come from the Englishman after class.
I received an invitation from the Englishwoman.
You find many idioms in modern English.

example_sentence_italian: Nel manuale dell'inglese ci sono esempi.
example_sentence_english: There are examples in the English manual.
I read an article about the Englishman.

example_sentence_italian: Parliamo sull'inglese e la sua storia.
example_sentence_english: We talk about the Englishwoman and her history.
I collaborate with the Englishman every week.
I go to the cinema with the Englishwoman.

notes: contraction of di + gli; also used as partitive
example_sentence_english: I talked about some English people yesterday.

example_sentence_italian: Regalo libri agli inglesi della classe.
example_sentence_english: I give books to the English people in the class.
I received letters from the English people.

example_sentence_italian: Trovo differenze negli inglesi delle diverse regioni.
example_sentence_english: I find differences in the English people from different regions.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono articoli sugli inglesi online.
example_sentence_english: There are articles about the English online.

notes: no contraction commonly used for con + gli
example_sentence_english: We organize events with the English people.
I speak to the English women in the group.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono parole nuove nelle inglesi moderne.
